project.name: openuser
project.description: Intelligent Digital Human System with hot-reload plugins, self-evolving agents, and multi-platform integration

commonPatterns.name: agent-self-update
commonPatterns.description: Agents can update themselves via prompts

workflowReminders.name: activate-environment
workflowReminders.description: Always activate virtual environment before running commands

workflowReminders.name: commit-after-milestone
workflowReminders.description: After each small milestone, commit to git and push to remote
steps: Update TODO.md to mark completed tasks

decisions.decision: Implemented core system with 100% test coverage
decisions.rationale: Following TDD principles to ensure code quality and maintainability
decisions.impact: All core modules (plugin_manager, agent_manager, config_manager) are fully tested

decisions.decision: Implemented database models and Redis cache with 100% test coverage
decisions.rationale: Phase 1.3 completion - database and cache infrastructure ready for API layer
decisions.impact: User, DigitalHuman, and Task models implemented with Alembic migrations. Redis manager provides caching and session management.

decisions.decision: Implemented voice synthesis module with multiple TTS backend support
decisions.rationale: Phase 2.1 start - providing flexible TTS options (Coqui TTS, pyttsx3, gTTS) to support different use cases and deployment environments
decisions.impact: Voice synthesis module with 100% test coverage. Supports GPU/CPU, voice cloning, and multiple TTS backends. Ready for integration into digital human pipeline.

decisions.decision: Created comprehensive documentation structure for the project
decisions.rationale: Proper documentation is essential for maintainability and onboarding. Created CHANGELOG, API docs, and troubleshooting guides.
decisions.impact: Complete documentation for voice synthesis module including API reference, usage examples, known issues, and troubleshooting. Established documentation patterns for future modules.

decisions.decision: Implemented voice cloning pipeline with profile management
decisions.rationale: Phase 2.1 continuation - voice cloning is essential for personalized digital humans. Implemented comprehensive profile management system for storing and managing voice samples.
decisions.impact: Voice cloning module with 100% test coverage. Supports multi-sample voice profiles, audio validation, profile persistence, and metadata management. Ready for integration with TTS models.

decisions.decision: Implemented audio preprocessing and enhancement module
decisions.rationale: Phase 2.1 continuation - audio preprocessing is critical for high-quality voice synthesis. Provides comprehensive audio processing pipeline including normalization, noise reduction, and format conversion.
decisions.impact: Audio preprocessing module with 100% test coverage. Supports multiple audio formats, sample rate conversion, normalization, silence trimming, optional noise reduction, and quality validation. Ready for integration into voice processing pipeline.

currentPhase: Phase 2: Digital Human Engine - Voice Processing (In Progress)
nextMilestone: Phase 2.1: Real-time voice synthesis API, then Phase 2.2: Face Animation
